entry.title: NEOTAD - Dietary Supplement | 20 Sachets
entry.summary:
Vendor: Biomedica Foscama
Type: NEOTAD
Price: 55.00

Key Features:

  • Product Name: NEOTAD Dietary Supplement
  • Form: Sachets
  • Package Size: 20 sachets

Description:
NEOTAD is a premium dietary supplement formulated with reduced L-Glutathione (Setria), Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Selenium. These key ingredients are known for their powerful antioxidant properties: Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Selenium contribute to protecting cells from oxidative stress. Ideal for individuals with limited dietary intake or increased nutritional needs, NEOTAD provides essential support for cellular health and overall well-being.

Ingredients:

  • Fructose
  • Reduced L-Glutathione (Setria)
  • Vitamin C (L-Ascorbic Acid)
  • Sweeteners: Isomalt, Aspartame, Sucralose
  • Grapefruit Flavor
  • Vitamin E (d,l-Alpha-Tocopheryl Acetate)
  • Anti-caking Agent: Silicon Dioxide
  • Sodium Bicarbonate
  • L-Selenomethionine

Nutritional Values (Per Sachet and % of Recommended Daily Intake):

  • Reduced L-Glutathione (Setria): 250 mg
  • Vitamin C: 250 mg (313% RDI)
  • Vitamin E: 36 mg (300% RDI)
  • Selenium (L-Selenomethionine): 20 mcg (36.4% RDI)

Usage Instructions:
Take one sachet daily. Pour the contents directly into your mouth for fast absorption and convenience.

Important Notes:

  • Keep out of reach of children.
  • Do not exceed the recommended daily dose.
  • This product is not a substitute for a balanced diet and healthy lifestyle.
  • Excessive consumption may cause a laxative effect.

Storage Instructions:
Store in a cool, dry place away from heat sources. Shelf life: 36 months (unopened).

Package Details:

  • Quantity: 20 sachets
  • Net Weight: 40 g

Why Choose NEOTAD?
NEOTAD is the ultimate choice for supporting your health with a powerful blend of antioxidants and essential nutrients. Designed to protect your cells and enhance overall vitality, it’s a smart addition to your daily wellness routine.

entry.title: Curcumin IV | IM Infusion | 25/100mg
entry.summary:
Vendor: PEN PEPTIDE
Type: Turmeric (Curcumin)
Price: 58.00 - 66.00 (2 variants)

What is Curcumin IV (Turmeric) ?

Curcumin IV is the active compound found in turmeric, a herb from the ginger family, known for its antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, and potentially anticancer properties. Products containing curcumin are often used in dietary supplements, cosmetics, and medications.

IV-IM Infusion refers to the intravenous (IV) or intramuscular (IM) application of curcumin. This means that curcumin is administered directly into the bloodstream or muscles through infusion, which may improve the bioavailability and effectiveness of the substance compared to oral forms of intake. Such methods are typically used in medical settings for treatment or as part of specialized therapies.

What are the benefits of Curcumin IV (Turmeric):

Curcumin, the active ingredient in turmeric, offers numerous potential health benefits:

  • Anti-inflammatory properties: Curcumin IV is widely known for its powerful anti-inflammatory effects, making it useful in treating conditions like arthritis and other inflammatory diseases.
  • Antioxidant properties: Curcumin IV is a strong antioxidant that helps combat oxidative stress and can protect against cellular damage caused by free radicals.
  • Brain health improvement: Some studies suggest that Curcumin IV can support brain health by improving cognitive functions and reducing the risk of neurodegenerative diseases like Alzheimer's disease.
  • Heart health improvement: Curcumin IV may improve heart health by reducing inflammation and oxidation, which are significant factors in cardiovascular diseases.
  • Depression symptom alleviation: There is evidence that Curcumin IV may have antidepressant properties and help alleviate symptoms of depression.
  • Potential anticancer properties: Research indicates that Curcumin IV may have anti-cancer effects by inhibiting the growth of cancer cells and the spread of tumors.
  • Digestive support: Curcumin may improve digestion and relieve symptoms of various digestive disorders.

It is always recommended to consult with a doctor or qualified health professional before starting any supplement.

Turmeric combined with Exosomes:

The combination of Curcumin IV with exosomes represents an innovative area in medicine and biology. Here are some key aspects of this combination:

  • Exosomes: These are microscopic vesicles released by cells that play a role in cell communication, transferring various molecules like proteins, RNA, and DNA between cells. They are widely studied for their potentials in areas like regenerative medicine, immunotherapy, and drug delivery.
  • Curcumin: It is the active component in turmeric with antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, and potentially anticancer properties.
  • Turmeric and Exosomes Combination: Combining Curcumin IV with exosomes may enhance the delivery of curcumin to cells. Exosomes can act as natural transport systems, increasing the stability and bioavailability of curcumin in the body. This can significantly improve the effectiveness of Curcumin IV in targeted therapy, such as in treating inflammatory diseases or cancer.
  • Potential Therapeutic Applications: This combination may find application in areas like targeted cancer therapy, treatment of inflammatory diseases, and regenerative medicine.

Clinical studies and their results:

Curcumin, the active compound in turmeric, has been the subject of several clinical studies due to its potential therapeutic properties, including anti-inflammatory and antioxidant effects.

In a study published in the journal "Trials," turmeric was compared to diclofenac, a standard treatment for osteoarthritis. The study involved 139 patients divided into two groups: one received Curcumin IV and the other diclofenac. The therapy lasted 28 days. Results showed significant improvement, including pain reduction and better knee function in patients treated with Curcumin IV, comparable to those observed with diclofenac.

Another study analyzed the effects of Curcumin IV in patients with ulcerative colitis, a form of inflammatory bowel disease. Patients who regularly took Curcumin IV alongside standard treatment showed significant improvement in symptoms and a reduced need for medications. Curcumin IV was effective in reducing inflammation and improving intestinal function.

Proper intake and dosage of Curcumin IV-IM Infusion:

The treatment is administered 2-3 times a week. Intravenously at 100mg per intake for an indefinite period depending on the patient's needs. Intramuscularly at 25mg per intake, again for an indefinite period depending on the goals.

Why choose Pen Peptide?

If you are looking for the highest-quality Curcumin IV with over 99% purity, dtspharmacy.com is one of the best places where you can order it online. Pen Peptide is a brand specialized in synthesizing highly purified peptides designed for scientific research and development. We offer peptides produced in high-quality laboratories.

entry.title: L-Arginine IV | Application | 5000mg
entry.summary:
Vendor: PEN PEPTIDE
Type: L-Arginine
Price: 49.00

What is L-Arginine IV?

L-Arginine IV (Intravenous Application) with a dose of 5000mg is a cutting-edge medicinal product designed for direct intravenous administration. L-arginine is a vital amino acid that plays a critical role in numerous biological processes in the body. Delivered intravenously, L-Arginine IV ensures rapid absorption and higher bioavailability compared to oral forms, providing faster and more effective results.

L-Arginine IV is widely recognized for its ability to improve circulation and accelerate wound healing by stimulating the release of nitric oxide, which relaxes and dilates blood vessels. This product is commonly used in clinical settings to address cardiovascular conditions, enhance athletic performance, and promote faster recovery post-exercise. Its applications extend to supporting immune function and managing certain metabolic disorders.

How does L-Arginine IV work?

L-Arginine IV operates through several essential mechanisms:

Conversion to Nitric Oxide (NO): One of its main functions is to serve as a substrate for nitric oxide synthase enzyme, which converts L-arginine into nitric oxide. Nitric oxide is a potent vasodilator that helps relax and expand blood vessels, improving circulation and reducing blood pressure.

Stimulation of Hormones: L-arginine participates in stimulating the release of some hormones, including growth hormone and insulin, which are important for regulating metabolism and tissue growth.

Improving Immune Function: It can improve immune function by supporting the activity of certain immune cells and the production of antibodies.

Protein Synthesis: As an amino acid, L-arginine is an important component for protein synthesis, which is essential for the growth and recovery of tissues.

Accelerating Wound Recovery: Acts as a catalyst in the wound recovery process, accelerating cell regeneration and improving healing.

Improving Endothelial Function: Aids in improving the function of the endothelium, the inner layer of blood vessels, which helps prevent atherosclerosis and other cardiovascular diseases.

These actions make L-Arginine IV an invaluable tool for addressing cardiovascular health, improving immunity, optimizing metabolism, and accelerating tissue recovery.

What are the benefits of L-Arginine?

When you choose to buy L-Arginine IV, you gain access to a range of health and wellness benefits:

  • Improves circulation: Helps dilate blood vessels, improving circulation throughout the body.
  • Aids in wound healing: Accelerates the wound healing process through improved blood supply and tissue regeneration.
  • Improves cardiovascular function: May aid in the treatment of heart diseases and conditions related to the cardiovascular system.
  • Stimulates the release of hormones: Supports the release of important hormones, including insulin and growth hormone.
  • Improves athletic performance: Increases physical endurance and accelerates recovery after exercises.
  • Supports the immune system: Strengthens the immune system and aids in fighting infections.
  • Improves sexual function: May improve sexual function through improved circulation.
  • Relieves stress symptoms: Supports the body in coping with physiological stress and fatigue.
  • Improves cognitive functions: May improve brain function and cognitive abilities through increased blood flow to the brain.
  • Treatment of metabolic disorders: Beneficial in treating some metabolic disorders, such as high blood pressure or insulin resistance.

Why choose L-Arginine IV?

By choosing L-Arginine IV, you ensure your body receives this essential amino acid in its most bioavailable form. Intravenous administration bypasses the digestive system, delivering immediate benefits for conditions requiring rapid action, such as poor circulation or delayed wound healing. This makes L-Arginine IV ideal for individuals seeking advanced therapeutic solutions for cardiovascular, metabolic, or immune-related challenges.

Side effects:

While L-Arginine IV is generally well-tolerated, it may cause mild side effects in some individuals:

Stomach upsets: May cause stomach discomfort or gas.

Headache: In some cases, especially at high doses, it may cause mild headaches.

Low blood pressure: Since L-arginine dilates blood vessels, this can sometimes lead to a decrease in blood pressure.

Allergic reactions: In very rare cases, allergic reactions such as itching or rash may occur.

Vasodilation: May cause some relaxation of blood vessels, which sometimes leads to skin flushing.

It is important to consult a doctor before using L-arginine, especially if you are pregnant or taking other medications. The doctor can assess your condition and suggest the most appropriate dose and method of application to minimize the potential occurrence of some side effects.

Correct intake and dosage of L-Arginine (IV Application):

L-Arginine IV is dissolved in 100 milliliters of sodium chloride to ensure safe and effective introduction into the body. The recommended dosing regimen includes administering 5000 milligrams of L-arginine every other day.

This method of application is followed for a series of 3 to 4 infusions. After completing these infusions, it is important to provide a rest period for the body. This rest period lasts about a week and is essential to prevent the body from becoming saturated with the amino acid and to minimize side effects. The rest also allows the body to fully assimilate the amino acid and to maximize its benefits.

It is always recommended to consult with a medical specialist before starting such therapy.

Why buy L-Arginine IV from Pen Peptide?

When you buy L-Arginine IV from Pen Peptide, you invest in a high-quality product manufactured in state-of-the-art laboratories with over 99% purity. Pen Peptide specializes in pharmaceutical-grade peptides designed for scientific research and medical applications, ensuring optimal safety and efficacy.

With fast delivery and exceptional customer support, L-Arginine IV from Pen Peptide is the trusted choice for those seeking reliable solutions for cardiovascular health, immune support, and enhanced athletic performance.

entry.title: TAD 600mg (Glutathione) | 10pcs
entry.summary:
Vendor: PEN PEPTIDE
Type: TAD 600mg (Glutathione)
Price: 102.00

What is TAD 600mg?

TAD 600mg is a form of the dietary supplement Glutathione, which is administered intravenously via injection. The specially created form of Glutathione allows for rapid and effective introduction of the substance into the bloodstream, bypassing the action of the digestive system.

TAD600mg contains 600 milligrams of Glutathione per milliliter. This supplement is intended for the treatment of various diseases associated with oxidative stress, inflammations, or other conditions that can be improved with the help of Glutathione.

The advantage of intravenous TAD 600mg is that it can be quickly and efficiently delivered to the body without being metabolized by the digestive system, making it especially useful for those who have certain digestive difficulties or need fast and effective therapy.

Intravenous Glutathione - TAD 600mg is generally not intended for self-treatment and should be used under the supervision of a specialist. Always consult with them before starting your treatment with intravenous TAD 600mg or other forms of Glutathione.

What are the benefits of TAD 600mg Glutathione?

As already mentioned, TAD600 mg is a supplement containing an antioxidant naturally produced in our body - Glutathione. Below we list some of the benefits associated with the intake of TAD600mg:

  • Improving immune function - Glutathione is important for the body's immune system and can assist in combating infections and illness, making TAD600 mg an excellent choice for users wanting to enhance their immune function.
  • Improves liver health - Glutathione plays a crucial role in breaking down toxins in the liver and can support its health.
  • Enhances skin health - Glutathione can protect the skin from free radical damage and help improve skin tone and texture.
  • Enhances athletic endurance - Glutathione can help muscles recover their energy faster and reduce fatigue in athletes during training. This is why TAD 600mg is also preferred by many athletes.
  • Enhances metabolism - Glutathione can assist in body metabolism and reduce inflammation processes in it.
  • Improves sleep quality - Glutathione reduces oxidative stress levels in the body, leading to improved sleep quality.
  • Enhances heart health - by reducing inflammation and oxidative stress in the body.
  • Glutathione can enhance joint health and reduce pain.

Administration and application of TAD 600mg 4ml Glutathione:

Intravenous glutathione therapy is tailored to the patient's needs and condition. Recommended administration guidelines are as follows:

For detoxification: 3–5 infusions over a 7-day period, using doses of 1 g to 1.8 g per session.

For skin whitening: 5 infusions of 1200 mg over 10 days, combined with 1 g of Vitamin C.

Glutathione is dissolved in a vial with 100 ml of 0.9% NaCl solution.

This therapy can be repeated after 3 to 5 weeks to achieve optimal results. It is important to note that the dosage and frequency of infusions may be adjusted based on individual response to the therapy and the desired outcomes. Patients should consult with a qualified medical professional to ensure the therapy is suitable for their health condition and to guarantee the safety and effectiveness of the treatment.

Possible side effects of TAD 600mg Glutathione:

The TAD600mg supplement contains Glutathione and has a positive effect on health. However, the intake of this product may lead to some mild side effects, especially with high dosage or prolonged use.

Headache, nausea, stomach discomfort are the most known side effects from the intake of TAD 600mg.

To avoid the side effects of this product, it is important to adhere to the instructions regarding the proper intake and dosage of TAD 600mg.

entry.title: Buy Resveratrol | 500mg
entry.summary:
Vendor: PEN PEPTIDE
Type: Resveratrol
Price: 65.00

What is Resveratrol?

For those looking to buy Resveratrol, this natural compound is a powerful antioxidant from the polyphenol family, renowned for its health benefits. 

Resveratrol is beneficial for health, exhibiting anti-inflammatory and anti-cardiovascular properties, improving metabolism, reducing the risk of diabetes, positively influencing metabolic pathways, and glucose tolerance. Taking Resveratrol improves heart health by reducing bad cholesterol levels, increasing good cholesterol levels, regulating blood pressure, and enhancing endothelial function.

Resveratrol improves endurance and muscle mass gain, making it popular among athletes. It aids in recovery after intense workouts and reduces inflammation and pain.

It is involved in the production of mitochondria, which support energy production in cells. Thanks to this, Resveratrol leads to improved athletic achievements, increasing endurance, and muscle mass of the athlete.

What are the benefits of Resveratrol?

As one of the most researched phytochemicals, Resveratrol is known for its potent antioxidant properties and its numerous health benefits, which are as follows:

  • Resveratrol helps improve heart and vascular health by reducing “bad” cholesterol levels and raising “good” cholesterol levels.
  • Resveratrol enhances the immune system, protecting the body from infections and diseases.
  • Resveratrol aids in reducing inflammation and has anti-inflammatory properties, beneficial for diseases like arthritis and diabetes.
  • It improves the health and elasticity of the skin, protecting it from harmful UV ray exposure.
  • Resveratrol helps improve sleep quality.
  • It aids in combating aging, slowing down the process. Resveratrol also protects against degenerative diseases like Alzheimer's and Parkinson's.
  • Resveratrol assists in blood pressure control and improves circulation.
  • Resveratrol enhances metabolism and plays a role in blood sugar control and diabetes prevention.
  • It aids in improving brain function, memory, and cognitive abilities.

These benefits highlight why many individuals seek to buy Resveratrol for its wide-ranging health advantages.

Clinical trials of Resveratrol and their results:

Resveratrol is one of the most studied and researched phytochemicals found in large quantities in strawberries, nuts, grape seeds, and other foods. Its numerous benefits and potent antioxidant property have been proven through many clinical tests.

In one of the largest clinical trials related to Resveratrol and its impact on the cardiovascular system, it was found to improve the functions of the endothelium - the inner layer of blood vessels, and helps to normalize blood pressure. The results of this study were published in "The New England Journal of Medicine" and provide a new perspective on maintaining bodily health.

In another study conducted by scientists in Copenhagen, the results show that the use of Resveratrol helps slow down the aging processes and improves the body's functions. During the clinical trial, participants received doses of Resveratrol equivalent to those found in 150 bottles of red wine. Improvements in glucose metabolism, reduced inflammation, and enhancement of the cardiovascular system were observed in them.

In another study published in the journal "Nutrition Research", researchers demonstrated the positive effect of Resveratrol on patients with type 2 diabetes. It controls their blood sugar, improves glucose metabolism, and reduces levels of glycated hemoglobin.

Another clinical study showed the positive influence of taking Resveratrol on the brain functions of older people, improving their memory and concentration.

In the "Journal of Clinical Endocrinology and Metabolism", the results of another trial have been published, proving the positive effect of Resveratrol in improving fat and glucose metabolism, as well as reducing insulin levels in patients with metabolic syndrome.

All conducted clinical studies show the positive benefits of Resveratrol for human health and better quality of life. It is important to note that its benefit can be as part of a healthy lifestyle and proper human nutrition.

Proper intake and dosage of Resveratrol 500mg:

If you’re planning to buy Resveratrol, it’s important to follow the recommended dosage:

The product is intravenous; the vial is dissolved and poured into a 100ml sodium chloride flask. The maximum intake is 3 times a week at 500mg.

Possible side effects of Resveratrol:

Resveratrol is known for its potent antioxidant effects and, like all dietary supplements, some side effects may occur if its dosage is exceeded.

The most commonly encountered side effects from Resveratrol are feelings of stomach discomfort, gas, constipation, or diarrhea. They are not dangerous and typically disappear within a few days.

Although resveratrol is usually safe for consumption, it is important not to exceed its dosage.

Why choose Pen Peptide?

For those searching to buy Resveratrol online, quality and purity are essential. Pen Peptide offers Resveratrol with over 99% purity, manufactured in high-quality laboratories. Available at dtspharmacy.com, our Resveratrol products are designed to support scientific research and development while meeting the highest standards of safety and efficacy.
